Name: Baddieboo
Desc: Don't mess with it... It won't care if you're a human or Bangboo when it gets angry!

1.Name: Rocket Barrage
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Sends rockets and molotov cocktails at the target enemy, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

1.Name: Unusually Short Fuse
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there is at least one <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> DMG increases by 20%. When the target is an <color=#FFFFFF>Organic</color> enemy, this buff increases by an additional 15%.

2.Name: Unusually Short Fuse
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there is at least one <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> DMG increases by 25%. When the target is an <color=#FFFFFF>Organic</color> enemy, this buff increases by an additional 19%.

3.Name: Unusually Short Fuse
3.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there is at least one <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> DMG increases by 30%. When the target is an <color=#FFFFFF>Organic</color> enemy, this buff increases by an additional 23%.

4.Name: Unusually Short Fuse

5.Name: Unusually Short Fuse

1.Name: Rocket Blast!
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Jumps forward and fires a rocket, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to enemies in a large area ahead.
